data.eml:eml: Two new whiprays, Maculabatis arabica sp. nov. and M. bineeshi sp. nov. (Myliobatiformes: Dasyatidae), from the northern Indian Ocean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Manjaji-Matsumoto, B. Mabel, Last, Peter R. (2016): Two new whiprays, Maculabatis arabica sp. nov. and M. bineeshi sp. nov. (Myliobatiformes: Dasyatidae), from the northern Indian Ocean. Zootaxa 4144 (3): 335-353, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4144.3.3
